summary: This document is an email exchange between Jeffrey Epstein and Jes Staley, discussing personal sentiments and expressing friendship. The email highlights a sense of camaraderie and confidentiality, with Staley wishing Epstein a happy new year and indicating a toast to their friendship.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Epstein is the sender of the email, expressing personal sentiments to Jes Staley.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Staley is the recipient of the email, conveying friendship and well wishes to Epstein.

connections.description: Epstein and Staley share a personal friendship, as indicated by the warm tone of the email.

keyFacts: The email was sent on December 31, 2010, from Jeffrey Epstein to Jes Staley.
Staley expresses a personal connection and friendship with Epstein.
Epstein apologizes for typos in his email, indicating a casual tone.
The email contains a confidentiality disclaimer related to JPMorgan Chase.
